title: NETHOUSE ORB / fireplace phasmid
description: You think the fire iron is a phasmid.

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "Is that the phasmid? It looks like..."
dialogueTree.text: Is that the phasmid? It looks like the phasmid, leaning against the wall...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wait, what if this is the fishing r..."
links.text: Wait, what if this is the fishing rod situation all over again?

links.title: You: "Try to sneak up to the phasmid."
links.text: Try to sneak up to the phasmid.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's not the phasmid... It's not ev..."
links.text: It's not the phasmid... It's not even organic -- it's a fire iron. How disappointing!

links.title: Inland Empire: "Right?! You'll have better luck nex..."
links.text: Right?! You'll have better luck next time, though. The phasmid -- finding it is your destiny.

links.title: You: "Give the dream of discovering the I..."
links.text: Give the dream of discovering the Insulindian phasmid a rest... for now. [Leave.]

links.title: You: "Of course that wasn't the phasmid...."
links.text: Of course that wasn't the phasmid. It's way too big.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Don't be too hard on yourself. You..."
links.text: Don't be too hard on yourself. You couldn't have known that for sure. And, besides, finding this phasmid is your special destiny -- you can feel it!

links.title: You: "This is what I get for trying to be..."
links.text: This is what I get for trying to be a scientist instead of a cop. I mean, I'm not even a *good* cop.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You were just following your instin..."
links.text: You were just following your instincts, your destiny. You're meant to find the phasmid! Just maybe not here...

links.title: You: "Leap toward the phasmid and clasp i..."
links.text: Leap toward the phasmid and clasp it in your hands!

links.title: You: "You're not going to be fooled again..."
links.text: You're not going to be fooled again. You're going to stand here calmly and observe this non-phasmid until you see what it really is...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Fine. It's not a phasmid. It's not..."
links.text: Fine. It's not a phasmid. It's not even organic. Just a fire iron resting by the fire place. But... where's your sense of wonder, man?

links.title: You: "Forget about the phasmid... err, fi..."
links.text: Forget about the phasmid... err, fire iron. [Leave.]
